headline.print_headline: After Two Bumper Years, Toyota Braces for Shift to Slower Growth
headline.main: After Two Bumper Years, Toyota Braces for Shift to Slower Growth

docs.snippet: Toyota Motor Corp is set to post record growth for the year just ended - with a likely $10 billion surge in operating profit - but the mood at its HQ in Japan's prosperous automotive heartland is cautious as executives warn of a leaner year ahead....
docs.lead_paragraph: Toyota Motor Corp is set to post record growth for the year just ended - with a likely $10 billion surge in operating profit - but the mood at its HQ in Japan's prosperous automotive heartland is cautious as executives warn of a leaner year ahead.

headline.print_headline: China Economic Growth Slows to 18-Month Low in First-Quarter
headline.main: China Economic Growth Slows to 18-Month Low in First-Quarter

docs.snippet: China's economy grew at its slowest pace in 18 months in the first quarter of 2014, official data showed on Wednesday, with signs of waning momentum already prompting limited government action to steady the world's second-largest economy....
docs.lead_paragraph: China's economy grew at its slowest pace in 18 months in the first quarter of 2014, official data showed on Wednesday, with signs of waning momentum already prompting limited government action to steady the world's second-largest economy.

headline.sub: Five students killed in Calgary mass stabbing at college party
headline.main: Five students killed in Calgary mass stabbing at college party

docs.snippet: Canadian police say the lone suspect was an invited guest and call the stabbings the worst mass murder in Calgary's history. Mana Rabiee reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Canadian police say the lone suspect was an invited guest and call the stabbings the worst mass murder in Calgary's history. Mana Rabiee reports.

headline.print_headline: Study Finds Signs of Brain Changes in Pot Smokers
headline.main: Study Finds Signs of Brain Changes in Pot Smokers

docs.snippet: A small study of casual marijuana smokers has turned up evidence of changes in the brain, a possible sign of trouble ahead, researchers say....
docs.lead_paragraph: A small study of casual marijuana smokers has turned up evidence of changes in the brain, a possible sign of trouble ahead, researchers say.

headline.print_headline: Amnesty: Haiti Human Rights Activist Threatened
headline.main: Amnesty: Haiti Human Rights Activist Threatened

docs.snippet: A leading human rights activist in Haiti has been threatened for his work, Amnesty International said Tuesday, marking the latest documented case of attacks or threats against watchdog groups in the Caribbean nation....
docs.lead_paragraph: A leading human rights activist in Haiti has been threatened for his work, Amnesty International said Tuesday, marking the latest documented case of attacks or threats against watchdog groups in the Caribbean nation.

headline.print_headline: Judge Blocks Massachusetts Ban on Painkiller
headline.main: Judge Blocks Massachusetts Ban on Painkiller

docs.snippet: A federal judge has blocked Massachusetts from banning the powerful new painkiller Zohydro....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge has blocked Massachusetts from banning the powerful new painkiller Zohydro.

headline.print_headline: Holder to Deliver Remarks in Overland Park
headline.main: Holder to Deliver Remarks in Overland Park

docs.snippet: The Justice Department says Attorney General Eric Holder will travel to Overland Park, Kan., on Thursday to pay tribute to the victims of the shootings at two Jewish community sites....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Justice Department says Attorney General Eric Holder will travel to Overland Park, Kan., on Thursday to pay tribute to the victims of the shootings at two Jewish community sites.

headline.print_headline: Alibaba's Growth Quickens in Time for Landmark U.S. IPO
headline.main: Alibaba's Growth Quickens in Time for Landmark U.S. IPO

docs.snippet: Alibaba Group Holding Ltd accelerated revenue growth in the crucial fourth quarter, the company reported on Tuesday, a timely lift for the Chinese Internet company as it prepares for a highly anticipated public offering....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alibaba Group Holding Ltd accelerated revenue growth in the crucial fourth quarter, the company reported on Tuesday, a timely lift for the Chinese Internet company as it prepares for a highly anticipated public offering.

headline.main: M.I.T.'s Alex Pentland: Measuring Idea Flows to Accelerate Innovation

docs.snippet: A computational social scientist says data, sensors and smartphones are opening the door to what he calls “social physics.”...
